Updated: September 25, 2025 @ 4:21 am
OAKLAND— Helen Jean (Broadwater) Harris, 84, of Oakland, passed away on Sept. 8, 2025 at her home.
Born on May 8, 1941, in Swanton, she was the daughter of Everett and Lennie Broadwater.
Helen enjoyed working for her family business, Harris Pools. She was a member of Deer Park United Methodist Church.
She is survived by her husband of 65 years, Harold Harris, who she married on Sept. 4, 1960; two sons, Delmas Harris and Ken Harris and wife Clarissa, both of Oakland; two grandchildren, Kevin and wife Helen and Kayge; siblings, Doris Harmon, Loretta Mangan and husband Dwight, Dale Broadwater and wife Sharon, and Margaret Uphold and husband Rodger; and a sister-in-law, Hazel Broadwater.
In addition to her parents, she was preceded in death by one son, Rick Harris; siblings, Ellis Broadwater and wife Ilene, Myrtle Beulah and husband Crouder, and Willard Broadwater; and a brother-in-law, Robert Harmon.
Friends will be received at the Fredlock & Fenner Funeral Homes, P.A. — Oakland, 21 N 2nd St., Oakland, on Saturday, Sept. 13, from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. A funeral service will follow, with Pastor Carl Lee officiating.
The Fredlock & Fenner Funeral Homes are honored to be assisting the Harris family.
